text: Arthur P. Cooley (June 2, 1934 â€“ January 30, 2022) was an American biology teacher, naturalist and expedition leader. He was a co-founder of the Environmental Defense Fund (EDF). He was born in Southampton, New York. Cooley died on January 30, 2022 in Grand Junction, Colorado at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American environmentalists Category:Educators from New York (state)
title: Art Cooley
